lemma SLC_sym: "\<exists>s\<^sub>3' s\<^sub>3. s\<^sub>3' \<approx> s\<^sub>3 \<and> (revision_step r' s\<^sub>2 s\<^sub>3' \<or> s\<^sub>2 = s\<^sub>3') \<and> (revision_step r s\<^sub>2' s\<^sub>3 \<or> s\<^sub>2' = s\<^sub>3) \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>s\<^sub>3 s\<^sub>3'. s\<^sub>3 \<approx> s\<^sub>3' \<and> (revision_step r s\<^sub>2' s\<^sub>3 \<or> s\<^sub>2' = s\<^sub>3) \<and> (revision_step r' s\<^sub>2 s\<^sub>3' \<or> s\<^sub>2 = s\<^sub>3')"
